before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"7q6to","text":"Always store cut-out devices in ethanol. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"30l40","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8oo8p","text":"Avoid exposing microfluidic devices, particularly the cell-adherent side, to open air and unnecessary contact. Once sterilised, devices should be handled with care following sterile working techniques.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8g89c","text":"This protocol described the fabrication of two- and three-open chambered microfluidics suitable for cell culturing using commercially acquired master mould.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"19td5","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5naid","text":"SYLGARD™ 184 Silicone Elastomer Kit (Dow, CAT# 1673921)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":35}],"data":{}},{"key":"dr8lf","text":"Geltrex™ LDEV-Free Reduced Growth Factor Basement Membrane Matrix (ThermoFisher Scientific, CAT# A3890401)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":13}],"data":{}},{"key":"c4l0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17bda","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es6fd","text":"Custom master mould containing both duo- and trio-chambers (manufactured in Microliquid, parent_collections.title: Do, Q. B. et al. (2023) Early striatal hyperexcitability in an in vitro human striatal microcircuit model carrying the Parkinson’s GBA-N370S mutation

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"br0jg","text":"A custom master mould containing both duo- and trio-chambers (Figure 1) is manufactured by and obtained from Microliquid (Spain). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aluq3","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t58r","text":"  ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D6161F50B2A711EDA846F1C2ED547A11","height":337.9207954545457,"id":365812,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"b898q","text":"Figure 1: Custom master mould.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"9d9c489f-40c8-4507-8f9f-724c742ed288.JPG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mfhybtrd7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mfhwbtrd7.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mfhxbtrd7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mfhvbtrd7.webp","width":253.55584924965908}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbpqd","text":"Mix 46 ml of silicon elastomer SylGARD 184, Dow Corning © with 4 mL of its curing agent (supplied in the same pack), i.e. the 1:10 ratio in a 50 ml falcon. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dtf5","text":"Mix well by inverting the falcon multiple times till a homogenous solution is seen by eye.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drjfv","text":"Slowly pour the mixture into the master mould and incubate for 2-2.5 hours at 60ºC.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qj6d","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs4k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9t4m7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"16fmn","text":"Varying incubation time can alter the device stiffness. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc2pc","text":"Manually remove the final cast from the mould using a sharp blade.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3e95h","text":"Manually cut out individual devices and immediately wash them with 100% ethanol.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tsoh","text":"Place dry and sterile devices on ethanol – sterilised 19 mm-diameter coverslips to form an instantaneously tight seal. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7j58","text":"Coat both chambers and microchannel area with Poly-D-Lysin (0.1 mg/ml) overnight followed by Geltrex™ prior to cell culturing.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Custom open-chamber microfluidic fabrication
